pr_title: Brightroll adapter - Adding bid floor config parameter

timeline.message: Adding global bid floor field as config

timeline.bodyText:
Not critical, but is it possible we don't need to update the imp?
In this case toBuilder() -> build() operations is redundant.
timeline.author: rpanchyk

replies.bodyText: Imp has to be updated in atleast one of the scenarios. Publishers need almost all of those configuration as there is no exchange in between to configure those. So imp update is a required one.
replies.author: smithaammassamveettil
rpanchyk

replies.bodyText: yes, I added just as a precaution. One or another case need to be executed atleast in this block as I mentioned above, publishers need those configuration since no exchange is present in between to configure those in the Prebid setup. BusinessInsider need all those configuration. May be some other publisher in future may pass bid floor, but need to go thru banner/video sections. So it is big chance that we need builder to be created all the time. Or I can remove the final declaration/initialization of ImpBuilder and create/initialize the Builder object in each if block if required(if Builder is not already created). Do you think is that better?
replies.author: smithaammassamveettil
rpanchyk
